Subclasses of ASysException in de.systemagmbh.interfaces.config
 class CSysConfigCastException
          This exception wraps NumberFormatExceptions in getXXXValue() methods.
 class CSysConfigException
          This is the base exception class for all config managers.
 class CSysConfigFormatException
          This exception is thrown when an operation on a tree node fails (e. g. add a parameter as a child to a parameter)
 class CSysConfigIOException
          This exception is thrown when the get/set of data fails.
 class CSysConfigNotFoundException
          This exception is thrown when the configuration (e.g. file, database) is not found.
 class CSysItemNotFoundException
          This exception is thrown when an element could not be found in the configuration.
